owl:Ontology.dc:title: EOL Biodiversity Subjects Ontology
owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Patrick Leary
owl:Ontology.dc:description: A vocabulary of subjects used to define organisms

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Barcode
owl:Class.dc:title: Barcode
owl:Class.dc:description: Links to barcode data, including BOL and others.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Citizen Science
owl:Class.dc:title: Citizen Science
owl:Class.dc:description: Links to citizen science projects relevant to this taxon.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Development
owl:Class.dc:title: Development
owl:Class.dc:description: Aspects of development in the focal taxon, including ontogenetic changes. This does not include life cycle information.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Education Resources
owl:Class.dc:title: Education Resources
owl:Class.dc:description: Links to education resources relevant to this taxon.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fossil History
owl:Class.dc:title: Fossil History
owl:Class.dc:description: A description of the known fossil history of the taxon. Known from what period and in what areas.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Functional Adaptations
owl:Class.dc:title: Functional Adaptations
owl:Class.dc:description: Biomechanics and other descriptions establishing relationships between morphologies, properties, or behaviors and their functions or adaptive significance.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Genome
owl:Class.dc:title: Genome
owl:Class.dc:description: Links to genomic information or full genomes of the focal taxon.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Identification Resources
owl:Class.dc:title: Identification Resources
owl:Class.dc:description: Links to identification keys or other identification resources that include this taxon.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Notes
owl:Class.dc:title: Notes
owl:Class.dc:description: A category intended as a place to map content that is difficult to fit into EOL subchapters or because it contains content intended for a wide variety of subchapters.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Nucleotide Sequences
owl:Class.dc:title: Nucleotide Sequences
owl:Class.dc:description: Links to sources of nucleotide sequences, including DNA, RNA, fragment length polymorphisms, SNP's, microsatellites, etc.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Systematics or Phylogenetics
owl:Class.dc:title: Systematics or Phylogenetics
owl:Class.dc:description: Description of the evolutionary relationships of this taxon and any controversies or important changes in the understanding of relationships. Also descriptions of any systematic or phylogenetic treatments of the taxon.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Taxonomy
owl:Class.dc:title: Taxonomy
owl:Class.dc:description: Information about taxonomic history, nomenclatural issues.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Type Information
owl:Class.dc:title: Type Information
owl:Class.dc:description: Information about type specimens associated with a given taxon; e.g., label data, the collection where they are stored, information about the specimens' history, etc.
